## Reminder
Components need to adhere to the [definition of done](https://github.com/usabilla/stylabilla/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#component-definition-of-done), including:
- Fully accessible, navigable by keyboard only and passes accessibility tests
- Highly performant
- Browser support [requirements](https://usabilla.atlassian.net/wiki/display/DEV/Browser+Support+Strategy) are adhered to
- The compiled css has been checked
- The component works responsively across all device widths, and is built mobile first
- Documentation is included with examples, browser support information, ARIA attributes and is readable and consistent with other components
-->
